Directions: In a large saucepan, saute rice and garlic in butter until golden brown.  Stir in water, carrots, bouillon, parsley, salt, basil and onion.  Bring to a boil.  reduce heat; cover and simmer for 5 minutes.  Stir in beef.  Transfer to a greased 9-in. square baking dish.  Cover and bake at 325 degrees F for 45 minutes, stirring twice.  Uncover; sprinkle with cheese.  Bake 5 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.
Ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, cooked and drained
